exclusion.criterion: past or present mental disorders: psychotic disorders, mood disorders, including bipolar disorders.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: significant self-injurious behavior (children who have caused visible harm to themselves).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: active seizure disorder (seizures within the past six months).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant or unstable medical illness, including patients with current evidence of clinically significant hematopoietic, or cardiovascular disease.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: gastrointestinal, liver, kidney, or other known conditions which will presently interfere with the absorption, distribution, metabolism, or excretion of drugs, seizure disorders (active), cerebrovascular disease or brain trauma as etiology of autistic behavior.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant unstable endocrine disorder, such as hypo- or hyperthyroidism or diabetes.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: recent history or presence of any form of malignancy.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: significant improvement of autism symptoms and behaviors to current medications or have only global autism ratings on the CGI of absent, minimal or mild severity, or who are more than minimally verbal.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: global autism ratings are assessed as being absent, minimal or mild.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: treatment within the previous 30 days with any drug known to have a well-defined potential for toxicity to a major organ.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant abnormalities in laboratory tests or physical exam.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: likely to require any other psychotropic medication during the study, with the exception of clonidine for insomnia (started at least one month prior to entrance into the study), as well as anticonvulsants at a constant dose for stable seizure disorder or, unless otherwise permitted.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: unable to tolerate taper from psychoactive medication, if specified.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: history of hypersensitivity or severe side effects associated with the use of galantamine, or other acetylcholinesterase inhibitors.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: prior treatment with galantamine of 4mg/day for 6 weeks.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a healthy woman, but has several exclusion criteria that make her likely ineligible.
